attributes.action: Amend the law in domestic abuse to include provocation and self defence
attributes.additional_details: I am a personal trainer and I teach self defence, in some cases, people victims have to stay with the abuser partly because of what I call domestic financial terrorism. It's where the abuser says "go on leave me but how will you pay the bills?" The victim has no choice but to stay. We have failed to protect these people. Systems must be put in place to protect them. It must not be forgotten that although the majority of victims of domestic abuse are women, men can suffer as well.
attributes.background: There have been high-profile cases where people have suffered years of domestic abuse. Something snapped and these people ended up murdering the abuser ending up with a life sentence in prison. The law must be changed to take into account the provocation of the abuser over a long period of time.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  There are already defences available in these cases. You can find out more here:
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-11469430

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to change.
